title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1482/88 of 30 May 1988 on the supply of various consignments of cereals and rice to Mozambique as food aid
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1482/88  of 30 May 1988  on the supply of various consignments of cereals and rice to Mozambique as food aid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A tendering procedure is hereby initiated for the award of a contract for the supply of cereals to Mozambique in accordance with the provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 2200/87 and with the conditions laid down in the Annexes hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
